name: Runic Power
entries: At 6th level, you gain the ability to imbue your strikes with powerful magical impacts. When you hit with a melee weapon attack or melee spell attack you can expend two sorcery points to manifest one of the following effects:

items: You deal {@dice 2d8} extra damage of your choice from fire, cold, lightning, acid, or thunder damage.
The creature must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked back up to 30 feet.
